titles.title: There is nothing like the Presence of the Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is nothing like the
presence of the Lord
Nothing like his presence
Nothing like his presence
There is nothing like the
presence of the Lord
Nothing like the presence of the Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There is nothing like the
goodness of the Lord
Nothing like his goodness
Nothing like his goodness
There is nothing like the
goodness of the Lord
Nothing like the goodness of the Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There is nothing like the
power of the Lord
Nothing like his power
Nothing like his power
There is nothing like the
power of the Lord
Nothing like the power of the Lord
